data.eml:eml: Review of the genus Pachyanthrax François (Diptera: Bombyliidae) from Egypt, with description of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article El-Hawagry, Magdi S. (2018): Review of the genus Pachyanthrax François (Diptera: Bombyliidae) from Egypt, with description of two new species. Zootaxa 4375 (4): 502-510, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4375.4.2
